SPECTRUM(NAME, G, INPUT, TYPE).description: SPECTRUM with parameter(s) NAME, G, INPUT, TYPE.

SPECTRUM(CREATE, AMPLITUDE, NAME, TIME I.description: SPECTRUM with parameter(s) CREATE, AMPLITUDE, NAME, TIME INCREMENT.

body: *SPECTRUM, CREATE=${1}, AMPLITUDE=${2}, NAME=${3}, TIME INCREMENT=${4}, G=${5}, TYPE=${6}, ABSOLUTE=${7}, RELATIVE=${8}, DAMPING GENERATE=${9}, EVENT TYPE=${10}, FILE=${11}
